title: Rolling - what is constant for cylinder down incli

content.prompt: A solid cylinder is released from rest and rolls without slipping down an inclined plane. Which of the following quantities remains constant as the cylinder rolls down the incline?

choices.label: The angular speed of the cylinder
The angular acceleration of the cylinder
The translational speed of a point on the outside surface of the cylinder
The translational acceleration of a point on the outside surface of the cylinder

unit.text: 6: Energy and Momentum of Rotating Systems

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
